author: Daniel Greene
description:
So it was a weird week. Let's talk about it a bit before trying to get back into the swing of things and moving on from what Naomi King falsely claimed. 
Merch website: https://danielbgreene.com/ 
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/DanielBGreene

🔥 HUGE Fantasy & Sci-Fi News! 🔥 From Magic: The Gathering getting a movie and TV universe to the Buffy the Vampire Slayer reboot, and Facebook stealing books to train AI—this episode is packed! Plus, Ne Zha 2 dominates the box office, Robert Eggers’ Werwulf promises pure nightmare fuel, and major book reveals from Folio Society, Guy Gavriel Kay, and T. Kingfisher! Let’s break it all down!

📢 TOP STORIES

00:00 Talking about what happened. I will get more in detail in the future.
